name.jp: ペットテイマーの奇跡

description.en: Randomly changes the level of a pet's current and previous class without changing the class itself. (Only works with B, A, and S Class Pets).
description.ar: Randomly changes the level of a pet's current and previous class without changing the class itself. (Only works with B, A, and S Class Pets).
description.br: Altera aleatoriamente o nível da classe atual e anterior do pet sem alterar a classe em si. (Funciona somente com pet de classe B, A e S)
description.cns: 使用后，装备中的召唤兽目前等级与前阶段等级随机重置，限制B阶段以上召唤兽可以使用。
description.de: Das Pet erhält einen zufälligen Statuswert für die momentane und die vorhergehende Klasse. Es ist nötig die Klasse bei diesem Vorgang zu wechseln. (Dies ist nur möglich mit den folgenden Klassen: B/A/S)
description.fi: Randomly changes the level of a pet's current and previous class without changing the class itself. (Only works with B, A, and S Class Pets).
description.fil: Randomly changes the level of a pet's current and previous class without changing the class itself. (Only works with B, A, and S Class Pets).
description.fr: objet magique redistribuant aléatoirement les statistiques du familier pour sa classe actuelle et la précédente (utilisable pour un familier de classe C/B/A/S uniquement) Attention ne ressucite pas un familier mort !
description.id: Secara acak mengubah level kelas pet saat ini dan sebelumnya tanpa mengubah kelas itu sendiri. (Hanya berfungsi dengan Pet Kelas B, A, dan S).
description.it: Randomly changes the level of a pet's current and previous class without changing the class itself. (Only works with B, A, and S Class Pets).
description.jp: 現在のランクと1つ前のランクのAbilityのレベルをランダムに変更します。ランクB/A/Ｓのペットを召還中に使用可能です。
description.kr: 리어펫의 레벨 변화 없이 현재 레벨과 전 레벨에서 얻은 능력치를 다시 한번 랜덤 확률로 레벨업 시킵니다.
description.nl: Randomly changes the level of a pet's current and previous class without changing the class itself. (Only works with B, A, and S Class Pets).
description.pl: Randomly changes the level of a pet's current and previous class without changing the class itself. (Only works with B, A, and S Class Pets).
description.ru: Случайным образом изменяет бонусы предыдущего и текущего уровня питомца. Сам уровень при этом остается прежним. (Допустимый уровень питомца: III-V.)
description.sp: Cambia aleatoriamente el nivel de la clase actual y anterior de una mascota sin cambiar la clase en sí. (Sólo funciona con mascotas de clase B, A y S).
description.sw: Randomly changes the level of a pet's current and previous class without changing the class itself. (Only works with B, A, and S Class Pets).
description.th: สุ่มเปลี่ยนระดับของคลาสปัจจุบันและคลาสก่อนหน้าของสัตว์เลี้ยงโดยไม่เปลี่ยนคลาสเอง (ใช้ได้กับสัตว์เลี้ยงคลาส B, A และ S เท่านั้น)
description.tw: 不更改召喚獸類別，更改召喚獸當前階段和前一階段所獲得的能力值隨機更改(僅限B/A/S級召喚獸)。
description.vi: Thay đổi ngẫu nhiên cấp độ của lớp hiện tại và lớp trước đó của thú cưng mà không thay đổi chính lớp đó. (Chỉ hoạt động với Vật nuôi Hạng B, A và S).
